# abcnet

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of abcnet is to compute scores for a abundant-concordant cytokine network. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of abcnet from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("heimannch/abcnet")
```
